mentions.context: Students worked with Stacy for two 90 minute sessions using the SimStudent platform to demonstrate problems in linear equations, and give feedback to Stacy as she tried to solve problems in order to accomplish this goal.

Students learning algebra were introduced to a teachable agent named Stacy, implemented on the SimStudent platform (Matsuda et al., 2011), and were told that their goal was to help Stacy learn how to solve equations with variables on both sides to help her pass four sections of a quiz.
